name: Overview
data: [{"id":"c94ccbe5-8030-4a31-ac33-f3a29fe1b3ae","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2cd2be56-162a-4786-9e1d-31556b759f84","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Overview","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a87f7f92-7d8e-489d-99df-55c92a70c77b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function defines the required interface for producing formatted output in all formatter implementations. It represents the single, standardized entry point through which formatted data is produced.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"401562a3-1262-4522-964b-6a73eb09021d","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"d8859c88-084f-438d-88bd-a5ec4af70ab7","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ca5159a3-f97a-4240-95de-593f34cd86ff","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In the context of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function exists to enforce a contract rather than to perform actual work. It ensures that every subclass explicitly defines how formatted output should be generated.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4bc88ea9-4e5f-43ae-b47e-2adca0400aaf","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By raising an error in the base class, it prevents incomplete or incorrect formatter implementations from being used.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3a31ba22-c46f-4750-aa6f-6b841ccb3570","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ad2560b7-adb4-42e2-bf5c-9c5a7df15492","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Behavior","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3140791d-d143-4ee7-9edf-992dc58ebdca","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The base implementation of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" raises a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NotImplementedError","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This signals that the method is abstract in nature and must be overridden by any concrete formatter class.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3a80363d-cca4-49e2-9c25-26783c7d9202","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Calling this method directly on ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" indicates a misuse of the class and will always result in an exception.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d0b9a558-6c4b-450a-ac14-32f958ecabb1","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"bf69f965-9743-4e9d-9973-ab9539fdc83b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Expected Implementation in Subclasses","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"76ac4f80-e006-4918-9e00-c028d4d301e0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Subclasses are expected to override ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and provide logic appropriate to their formatting responsibility. The return value and internal behavior may vary depending on the formatter, but the method signature remains consistent.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a44e417f-ce3d-4ce1-9fbc-ff5e4e5c6038","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"class ExampleFormatter(BaseFormatter):\n    def generate(self):\n        return {\"result\": \"formatted output\"}","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"156a6da4-cda7-4f29-87b8-4e0c4e08e1ce","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"217e7724-af46-45dc-a5b2-a273b775bec6","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in the Formatter Architecture","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7caa52bc-fb47-4c40-abdb-b72a858acdbb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Within the formatter architecture, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" serves as the unifying interface that allows different formatter implementations to be used interchangeably. This design promotes modularity and makes it easy to extend the system with new formatter types.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"96240bbc-32e1-4e76-815c-60677fefe185","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ec07bbfe-17f7-47e1-a61d-eb443cc52e03","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0b8d481f-4c8e-433d-b1ef-473d6c120f65","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is an abstract method that defines the core contract for all formatters. By requiring subclasses to implement it, the system guarantees consistent interaction patterns while allowing flexibility in how formatted output is produced.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b04e6159-b6f4-4303-b51e-19eafddb2f1f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
